title: What are examples of idealism? - Quora

response.answer_text: A2A - What are examples of idealism? The most classic example that comes to my mind is the United Nations. The United Nations is a global organization that brings together its member states to confront common challenges, manage shared responsibilities and exercise collective action in an enduring quest for a peaceful, inclusive and sustainably developing world, in conformity with the principles of justice and international law. http://www.un.org/en/index.html
